Text: "I Hate Rock 'n' Roll" is a song by the Scottish alternative rock group The Jesus and Mary Chain.

Text: I Hate Rock 'n' Roll:  The reworked version of the track, which was dubbed as "I Love Rock 'n' Roll" was also included on the group's last album "Munki", released in 1998.
